mapper.select: SELECT b.POST_IDX AS post_idx, b.ID, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, b.UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt, b.VIEWS, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FREEBOARD_COMMENT c WHERE c.POST_IDX = b.POST_IDX ) AS comments, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FREEBOARD_LIKES l WHERE l.POST_IDX = b.POST_IDX ) AS likes FROM TB_FREEBOARD b
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT f.* FROM tb_freeboard f ORDER BY f.VIEWS DESC, f.CREATED_AT DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 8
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_freeboard (title, content, views, id, likes, comments) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{views}, #{id}, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT b.POST_IDX AS post_Idx, b.ID As id, b.TITLE As title, b.CONTENT As content, b.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, b.UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt, b.VIEWS As views, NVL(like_count.likes, 0) AS likes, NVL(comment_count.comments, 0) AS comments FROM TB_FREEBOARD b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT POST_IDX, COUNT(*) AS comments FROM TB_FREEBOARD_COMMENT GROUP BY POST_IDX ) comment_count ON b.POST_IDX = comment_count.POST_IDX LEFT JOIN ( SELECT POST_IDX, COUNT(*) AS likes FROM TB_FREEBOARD_LIKES GROUP BY POST_IDX ) like_count ON b.POST_IDX = like_count.POST_IDX WHERE b.POST_IDX = #{post_idx}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM as rnum FROM ( SELECT b.POST_IDX AS post_idx, b.ID, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.CREATED_AT AS createdAt, b.UPDATED_AT AS updatedAt, b.VIEWS, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FREEBOARD_LIKES l WHERE l.POST_IDX = b.POST_IDX ) AS likes, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FREEBOARD_COMMENT c WHERE c.POST_IDX = b.POST_IDX ) AS comments FROM TB_FREEBOARD b ORDER BY b.POST_IDX DESC ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{offset} + #{pageSize} ) WHERE rnum > #{offset}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_FREEBOARD_LIKES WHERE POST_IDX = #{post_idx} AND ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_FREEBOARD_LIKES WHERE POST_IDX = #{post_idx} AND ID = #{id}
